subtitle: Data Science Student | Computer Vision & Signal Analysis Enthusiast
aboutP1: I am a Data Science student, with a Bachelor's degree in Data Science (university degree in process) and an electromechanical technician. I am passionate about numerical problems, computer vision, and signal analysis.
aboutP2: I have constant curiosity and continuously seek learning and training to face new and more audacious challenges.
skillsPythonText: In Python, I have 4 years of experience with NumPy, SciPy, Matplotlib, scikit-learn, and PyTorch. I also have knowledge of Podman, Podman Compose (containerization), Bash (scripting), Git, and Flutter.
jobApexarDesc1: Design and development of web solutions with the Dart/Flutter SDK.
jobApexarDesc3: Design and development of CI/CD pipelines.
jobApexarDesc4: Work under a culture of continuous improvement and development under standards.
jobUBAHelpDesc1: Teaching algebra, linear algebra, discrete mathematics, numerical methods, and Python oriented to simulation and problem solving to courses of 50 to 150 people.
jobUBADivulgadorDesc1: Direction of activities for groups of 10 to 60 people, dissemination of science and technology concepts within the framework of the Science and Technology Fair of the Tecnópolis Scientific and Technological Hub.
jobCryticalDesc1: Design, planning, and development of electrical and refrigeration industrial works for clients such as FATE, Telecom, and other large technological clients.
